[Adblock Plus 2.0]
! Version: 201609020900
! The contents of this filter list are fetched from the repository: https://github.com/bopoh13/docs/tree/adblock/vendor/firefox
! Title: AeList (Adblock Edge)
! Last modified: 02 Sep 2016 09:00 UTC
! Expires: 3 days (update frequency)
!
! Please report any unblocked tracking or problems.
!
!--------------------General tracking systems-----------------------------------!
/advertising.$~object-subrequest
/adriver.$~object-subrequest
.adriver.$~object-subrequest
/googleads.$~object-subrequest
/pagead2.$~object-subrequest
||an.yandex.^$~object-subrequest
||awaps.yandex.
||bs.yandex.
||googleadservices.
||kiks.yandex.
||mc.yandex.
||yabs.yandex.
||avito.ru/s/a/*/dfp/px.js
||yandex.*/clck/$~ping
!--------------------Third-party tracking domains-------------------------------!
||advombat.ru^$third-party
||digitaltarget.ru^$third-party
||doubleclick.net^$third-party
||marketgid.com^$third-party,~popup,popup
||mxtads.com^$third-party
!--------------------Individual importunate systems-----------------------------!
##div#uptocall-mini
##div[id^="MarketGid"]
!--------------------Advertising blocks and scripts-----------------------------!
##iframe:not([src*="/www.youtube.com/"])
##div[id*="ads"],div[id*="adv"],div[id*="banner"]
##div[class*="adv"]
##div[class*="banner"],div[class*="promo"]
##span[class*="promo"]
##div[id$="underline"],div[class^="adsbygoogle"]
! Social networks
##div[class*="share"],ul[class*="post-share"],ul[class*="social-link"]
geektimes.ru,habrahabr.ru##div#vk_groups,div#facebook_like_box,div.twitter_stream
livejournal.com##div.lj-like
drive2.ru##div.g-column-wide > div:not([class*="offer"]):not([class~="c-slideshow"]):not([class~="c-post"]):not([class*="c-car-"]):not([class*="c-block-"])
drive2.ru###side-dv-pinned,div.c-block > div.c-block--alt-bg
pornhub.com,redtube.com##div[style^="display:"][style*="block"],div.footerWrapper
! Auto.ru
auto.ru##div[style^="display: block !important"]
auto.ru##table[class~="i-bem"] > tbody:not([class~="i-bem"])
! Google
google.com,google.ru##div.gb_ga
google.com,google.ru###extrares,.pdp-psy,#pdp-psy
translate.google.com,translate.google.ru##div.gb_xc,div.gb_wc
! Mail.ru News
news.mail.ru##div.box_collapse
! Yandex
##div#ya-share,div.ya-share2,div > yatag
yandex.ru##i.b-counter + div[class~="dist-popup"]
yandex.ru##div.content__left > div[class~="head-stripe"]
yandex.ru##div.content__left > ul[class~="serp-list"] > div:first-child,div[class~="footer-stripe"]
yandex.ru##div.related,div.scroll-spy,div[id$="teaser"][class~="i-bem"]
yandex.ru##.serp-item > .organic > h2:not([class$="title"]),h2:not([class$="title"]) ~ div
yandex.ru##li[class^="serp-item "]:not([class*="adresa"]):not([class*="forum"]):not([class*="image-stats"]):not([class*="z-maps"]):not([class*="z-market"])
! Yandex Images
yandex.ru##.page-layout__column_type_content.page-layout__column > div[class~="dist"]
yandex.ru##.incut__wrapper_footer_yes.incut__wrapper,.popup_type_modal
! Yandex Maps
yandex.ru##div[data-reactid] > div[style^="display:"][style*="block"]
yandex.ru##div.search-snippet-view > a[target="_blank"]
! Yandex News
news.yandex.ru##div.page-content__left > article:not([class^="story"]),div.page-content__right > article
news.yandex.ru##div.page-content__left > span,div.page-content__right > span
news.yandex.ru##div.page-content__left > div:not([class^="rubric"]):not([class^="page-content"]):not([class^="stories"]):not([class^="story"]):not([class^="quote"])
news.yandex.ru##div.page-content__right > div[class^="page-content"] > article,div.page-content__right > div[class^="page-content"] > span
news.yandex.ru##div.page-content__right > div[class*="addition"] > div:not([class^="addition"]),div.page-content__right > div[class^="addition"] ~ div
! Habrahabr
geektimes.ru,habrahabr.ru##.similar-posts,.column-wrapper_bordered,.xyz_wrapper
geektimes.ru##.post__body_full.post__body > .html_format.content > table,a[href="https://dronk.ru/"] ~ br
geektimes.ru##.post__body_full.post__body > .html_format.content > a[href="https://dronk.ru/"]:last-of-type > img
!--------------------Cosmetic fixes page layout---------------------------------!
kinozal.me,kinozal.tv##div.bx2_0:nth-last-child(2)
livejournal.com##div[class*="journalpromo"] + div.hr
! Auto.ru
auto.ru##div.search-controller__content > div.stat
auto.ru##div.sidebar__block:not(.specials-sales-wrap)
! Yandex
yandex.ru##div.content__left > div.misspell
! Yandex Images
yandex.ru##div.footer > div.distro
! Yandex Mail
mail.yandex.ru##body > div:first-of-type
!--------------------Whitelists to fix broken sites-----------------------------!
! Auto.ru (all parameters), Yandex Images
~auto.ru,~yandex.ru##div[class*="adv"]
! https://addons.mozilla.org/ru/firefox/addon/542220/
~avito.ru,~drom.ru##iframe[src*="/autoburn.ru/"]
! Google Mail
~mail.google.com##div[id][class~="gb_ga"],div[aria-label][class~="gb_ga"]
~mail.google.com,~youtube.com##iframe[src*="/webchat/"],iframe[src*="/notifications/"],iframe[class="talk-iframe"]
! Mail.ru
~mail.ru##div.js-slider__content
~deti.mail.ru,~lady.mail.ru##div[class*="promo"],div[class*="promo"][data-module],iframe[id^="instagram"]
! Yandex
~yandex.ru##iframe[src*="/mail.yandex.ru/"]
! Yandex Video
~yandex.ru##iframe[aria-label="Video"]
